title: Sufjan Stevens Zombie Song about Illinois
summary: Long-titled Sufjan Stevens song with zombie theme referencing Illinois
content: song titled 'They Are Night Zombies!! They Are Neighbors!! They Have Come Back From the Dead!! Ahhhh!', performed by Sufjan Stevens, features Illinois-themed lyrics, song duration is 5:10, includes lyrics 'I-L-L-I-N-O-I-S!' and 'Ring the bell and call or write us'
